string-array.name: shlokas
string-array.item:
गणाधीश जो ऎश सर्व गुणांचा
 मुल- रम्ब आरंभ तो निर्गुणांच
 नमू शरद मूळ चत्वार वाचा
 गमू पंथ अनंत या राघवाचा!
ho ho dfwjL\nho ho dfwjL\nho ho dfwjL

string-array.name: shlokasTransalation
string-array.item: God Ganesh, the god of all virtues and to whom the spirit owes its origin;\n Goddess Sharda, the goddess of speech; we bow to them.\n Now we will explore the way to reach Lord Rama which is considered as infinite
